code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./HorarioForm.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HorarioForm=_ref=>{let{onSubmitSuccess}=_ref;const[name,setName]=useState('');const[budget,setBudget]=useState('');const[category,setCategory]=useState('');const[errorMessage,setErrorMessage]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!name||!budget||!category){setErrorMessage('Todos os campos são obrigatórios');return;}try{const response=await axios.post('/horarios',{name,budget:parseFloat(budget),category});setName('');setBudget('');setCategory('');setErrorMessage('');if(onSubmitSuccess){onSubmitSuccess(response.data);}}catch(error){console.error('Erro ao salvar o horário:',error);setErrorMessage('Erro ao salvar o horário. Tente novamente.');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"horario-form-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Cadastrar Hor\xE1rio"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"horario-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"name",children:"Nome:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"name",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),placeholder:"Digite o nome",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"budget",children:"Or\xE7amento:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",id:"budget",value:budget,onChange:e=>setBudget(e.target.value),placeholder:"Digite o valor do or\xE7amento",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"category",children:"Categoria:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{id:"category",value:category,onChange:e=>setCategory(e.target.value),required:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",children:"Selecione uma categoria"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Trabalho",children:"Trabalho"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Prova",children:"Prova"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Orienta\xE7\xE3o",children:"Orienta\xE7\xE3o"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Co-Orienta\xE7\xE3o",children:"Co-Orienta\xE7\xE3o"})]})]}),errorMessage&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"error-message",children:errorMessage}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn-submit",children:"Salvar Hor\xE1rio"})]})]});};export default HorarioForm;
